game.name: Train Simulator: BR285 Diesel Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bring some diesel power to the Mosel Valley! This freight loco from developers RSSLO introduces an up-to-date diesel-powered version of the Traxx locomotive platform to Train Simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bring some diesel power to the Mosel Valley! This freight loco from developers RSSLO introduces an up-to-date diesel-powered version of the Traxx locomotive platform to Train Simulator.
